I realized I needed a way to track my progress, so I decided to start from absolute scratch by employing a “Beginner’s Mind” approach.

Some of the tasks I’ve completed:

  • configure fresh Ubuntu install within Windows Hyper-V VM client
  • created GitHub hub repository: https://github.com/bunsonh
  • set up git w/ SSH key
  • install and configure VS Code for editing and deploying to Github
  • install Jekyll static website generator
  • install and configure Just the Docs Jekyll theme
  • learn Jekyll filesystem and markup; create Hello World page

ToDo:

  • create ideal dir/file structure and populate index.md
  • deploy Jekyll site to GitHub pages
  • create progress tracker for LinkedIn Learning courses
